name: S.W.N LD#45
description:
Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 45

Theme:  Start With Nothing

Ludum dare page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/45/s-w-n

S.W.N is a platformer with a level editor where you start as a total zero, not even able to jump. Touch other numbers, gain and spend their powers to perform normal platforming actions. Be mindful, as performing a jump or dash reduces your number until you're back at zero. Touch flag to win!
